title: Authorizes issuance of income executions for distributive awards
summary: Specifically includes income executions in equitable distribution actions.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2224

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Codes

       AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules,  in  relation  to  the
         issuance of income executions for distributive awards

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1.  Paragraph 1 of subdivision (a)  of  section  5241  of  the
    2  civil  practice  law and rules, as amended by chapter 398 of the laws of
    3  1997, is amended to read as follows:
    4    1. "Order of support" means any temporary or  final  order,  judgment,
    5  agreement  or  stipulation incorporated by reference in such judgment or
    6  decree in a matrimonial  action  or  family  court  proceeding,  or  any
    7  foreign  support order, judgment or decree, registered pursuant to arti-
    8  cle five-B of the family court act which directs the payment of alimony,
    9  maintenance, support [or], child support OR A DISTRIBUTIVE AWARD.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07385-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the issuance of income executions for distributive awards
